item.description:
THIS WEEKEND IS SOLD OUT

Come on Up to the Wedeln Ski House for one of our most popular weekends of the Year. We will host our famous Chilifest so make sure you stick around until at least Sunday evening. Many members have Monday off so get in 3 days of skiing / riding if you can.

Most rooms have 2 bunk beds and are segregated by sex. If you are coming up with a friend of the same sex just let me know and we will try to put you in the same room. please bring your own sheet, blanket, pillows, towels.

Friday night: BYOB and get to know the others staying at the lodge for the weekend and find some ski buddies too!

Saturday: Breakfast (optional, $5). Then Ski, Ride or Hike!! Local mountains include Wildcat, Attitash and Cranmore, or you can take a ride to Sunday River, which is an hour from the house.

Saturday afternoon/evening: Apres ski fun and then dinner at Wedeln (optional), and perhaps some more fun by night.

Sunday: Breakfast (optional, $5, must pay in advance...payment details to come). Then, go for some more skiing/riding at local mountains, or snow shoe nearby the house, cross country ski in Jackson, or check out the outlets in North Conway.

Sunday afternoon/evening Our 8th annual Chilifestival will feature some of the finest crock pots of chili north of the border. Enter your own to win prizes our just enjoy sampling the creations. Live music by Rich Murphy.
Monday: sorry no breakfast but with the holiday many will stick around for another day on the slopes.

A $41 Prepayment is required, balance due upon arrival: The nightly rate is $20 per person. Meal package is $25 for both breakfasts and Saturday night dinner. Meals are optional but you must let us know ahead of time.

21+ only.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there by 7pm on Friday
item.name: MLK Weekend at Wedeln
